actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain real property listed on the National Register of Historic Places shall be exempt from the estate tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from estate taxes certain qualified historic property that is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain real property listed on the National Register of Historic Places shall be exempt from the estate tax.
